item.description:
HAPPY HOUR TIME! With The Ira.

Last Thursday we all had a Blast!!!!!! Don’t miss out on the fun, entertainment of Ira, and the Big 4- Get to Know Each Other Question Fun Period!!!!!!!! A big success for sure, and a tradition to be continued……

Filled with fun, stimulating conversation, meeting new folks, and enjoying the Happy Hour Food and Drink Specials. Celebrate the First Thursday of the month, and Celebrate Life!!!!!!!!

When: Thursday April 2 2009. 5:00PM-?
Back of Bar Area


Where: The Mill on the River, 989 Ellington Road, South Windsor, CT
item.how_to_find_us: In the back of the room Sign will be placed on the table. Singles Event

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Celebrate Life!!!! Happy Hour!!!!! at The Mill on the River!!!!!
